name: MIS Deliberate Damage to Prison Property draft
description: XXX0000 - v00.00.00 Last Modified: This report returns...

dataset.name: Incidents
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) AS INCIDENT_TYPE, AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT, AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_QUESTION AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_ANSWER AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK = AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK = AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK IN (1020, 1002, 854, 845, 8, 85, 102, 280, 414, 422, 447, 576, 677, 837) AND AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-04-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('01-04-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT INCIDENT_CASE_ID, INCIDENT_TYPE, RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT, QUESTION_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, DAY_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Log
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE (INCIDENT_QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('ESTIMATED COST OF DAMAGE')))

errors.error: Report Variant 82602.RS does not have corresponding dataset undefined
